feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [LIM1][Global Infrastructure] CPU temperature
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 19, 19:30 - 21:30 UTC

Jun 23, 03:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/07/2022 19:30 UTC
End time : 19/07/2022 21:30 UTC
Service impact : There will be an expected 20 mins of downtime per server
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to fix CPU temperature sensor bug.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - resetHwFlag removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 18, 07:00 - 07:10 UTC

Jun 17, 12:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 18/07/2022 07:10 UTC
Service impact : Customers using APIv6 with resetHwRaid within their scripts will get an error.
In order to solve the error, impacted customers should remove the flag from the script("POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start" "resetHwFlag" in "details").
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we will be making modifications to the baremetal software to remove the resetHwRaid optional flag, which could cause confusion as it is now performed systematically.

entry.title: VPS - UK2 - host1057201
entry.content:
Jul 7, 12:32 UTC
Resolved - Host is up and as a precaution we will live migrate all customers on the host to another host.

Jul 7, 11:10 UTC
Identified - Datacenter has identified issue with the host hardware and work is in progress to resolve the fault. We estimate further more downtime due to the complexity of the fault.
Current estimate of recovery is up to 2 more hours.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused

Jul 7, 09:10 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - E103A20
entry.content:
Jul 6, 15:03 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/07/2022 14:30 UTC
End Time : 06/07/2022 14:45 UTC
Service impact : Due to a maintenance that was being carried out, some servers turned off until our teams attended and powered back up the servers.
Root cause : Maintenance that was in progress.

entry.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - R802R13
entry.content:
Jul 6, 14:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/07/2022 12:44 UTC
End Time : 06/07/2022 14:15 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack R802R13 are operational again.
Root cause : Incident on a cooling system.

Jul 6, 13:41 UTC
Identified - Start time : 06/07/2022 12:44 UTC
Service impact : 98% of the impacted servers are operational again.
Root cause : Cooling system problem.
Ongoing actions : Our teams still working on the remaining down servers.

Jul 6, 13:09 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/07/2022 12:44 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack R802R13 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently investigating the root of this incident.
